name: Relax Mini Golf
description:
Play the mini golf game designed for the most relaxation!

Totally FREE for you to enjoy!
No annoying ads or in-app purchases.

Simple: Just tap and drag to shoot.
Saves your high score so you can compete against yourself and see your improvement!

- Moving obstacles to add extra challenge.
- Full mini golf experience including music, sounds and haptic feedback.
- Par values give you a goal to shoot for.
- Smooth rendering and simple physics.
- Works with Apple Pencil.
- Landscape and Portrait modes.

How many shots will it take you?

Designed and developed by Grant Jarvis and Jay Krane - Grade 7.
